body.name: Square Flexible Gooseneck LED Lighted 10X Magnifying Makeup Mirror, Power Locking Suction Cup, Bright Diffused Light, 360 Degree Swivel, Portable Cordless Travel and Home Bathroom Vanity Mirror
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 21 mins
features: 12 INCH FLEXIBLE EXTENSION – Adjustable gooseneck allows for the mirror to come to you, instead of having to constantly lean toward your mirror. No more bending over your countertop!

10X MAGNIFICATION - EXTREME MAGNIFICATION for those that need EXTRA help seeing specific spots on their face. NOTE : 10X is VERY STRONG and your face needs to be within 5 INCHES of the mirror for a clear undistorted image.
BRIGHT DAYLIGHT LED - Energy efficient LED light at the tap of your finger. Easily accessible push button switch in front of the mirror
ROTATING ADJUSTABLE ARM & POWERFUL SUCTION CUP - Easy to mount and easy to re-position. Our 360 degree rotating swivel arm adjusts to the best viewing angle
BUY NOW!! - 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED for 30 days. You will not regret this purchase!

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #37,463 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #108 in Compact & Travel Mirrors

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why choose JiBen LED Makeup Mirror? SPACE SAVER - Our mirror takes up zero precious counter space. Attached it to your existing mirrors or any surface that is smooth, non-porous and flat.CORDLESS & PORTABLE - No more dealing with messy cords and searching for an outlet. The rotating arm folds up compactly and neatly. It's ideal for home and travel.MODERN DESIGN - Unlike our competitors that have bulky battery compartment in the back, our mirror holds 3 AA batteries inside the mirror's casing. This results in a sleek and elegant look.NATURAL DAYLIGHT LEDs - Longer lasting and brighter than conventional incandescent bulbs. Our mirror diffuses the light from 14 LEDs to illuminate your face. Instructions Prior to mounting, clean surface with soap and water. Any dust or grime will prevent proper contact with the suction cup. Your mirror uses an unique suction locking cup that is more powerful than a regular suction cup. It does not require any glue, tape or silicone. Check to make sure that the suction lock is not already engaged by twisting it counter-clockwise. Press the suction lock against the surface and activate the locking mechanism by twisting clockwise. Adding a little bit of moisture will also help to create a stronger suction. Disclaimer JiBen LED Makeup Mirror requires a clean, flat and smooth surface of at least 3"X3" for the suction cup to work properly.The suction cup works best on non-porous surfaces, such as glass, ceramic tiles, porcelain, marble, granite and fiberglass.Avoid grout, stucco, drywall, wallpaper and other textured wall.Requires 3 AA batteries (not included).NOTE : This magnifying mirror requires your face to be within 5 inches for a clear undistorted image.

reviews.reviewerName: Mays' Healthy Lifestyle Mays' Healthy Lifestyle
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I use this every day - Really good product
reviews.reviewText: As a man who takes grooming seriously, the Square Flexible Gooseneck LED Lighted 10X Magnifying Makeup Mirror has become an indispensable part of my daily routine. This mirror offers exceptional clarity with its 10X magnification, ensuring I can flawlessly groom every detail, from trimming my beard to shaping my eyebrows.The gooseneck design allows me to adjust the mirror at any angle I need, making it effortless to find the perfect position for precise grooming. The built-in LED lights are a game-changer, providing optimal illumination without casting any shadows, even in dimly lit spaces.Its solid construction and sleek design add a touch of sophistication to my grooming area. The compact size is also great for travel, ensuring I always look sharp on the go.Whether it's prepping for an important meeting or just my daily grooming routine, this mirror has boosted my confidence, knowing I look my best. I can't imagine starting my day without this fantastic product, and I highly recommend it to any man who takes pride in his appearance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great suction and the light works like a charm. Not sure if I want to see myself that close, but it was a good purchase. The long, flexible neck is a great feature. I can move the mirror out of the way when I'm not using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It will do
reviews.reviewText: I have a very nice round wall mounted 10” mirror mounted in my bathroom. When I bought a vanity for my bedroom, I needed another magnification mirror for it. I bought this one. The suction cup is strong, on the proper surface. It has not fallen off the vanity mirror yet. I do constantly have to push it back up, as it tends to droop over time. Not horribly bad though. I can’t tell you about the light because I have not yet put batteries in it, as I use the vanity lights. It is a nice little mirror and will serve its purpose nicely, I guess I am just spoiled by the first one. I would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Much higher Quality
reviews.reviewText: This item is of much higher quality than other brands offer at same price point. Due to presbyopia, I do not want to live without this type of mirror, and thus I have owned several of them over recent years. This one has the tightest suction mechanism I have ever seen. Also the articulating arm is of perfect length, though slightly shorter than others. Kudos to the manufacturers!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently had cataract surgery, corrected for distance. Have been struggling with near vision and it was impossible to apply eye makeup. This mirror is a lifesaver. Grips tightly to my bathroom mirror, easy to remove and the lights are the perfect brightness. Easily adjusted, just place it a little higher than eye level as the weight will bring it down a little.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I loved this for the first few months, but it started falling off of the mirror and there’s nothing I can do to keep it up. I have to toss it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: If you're looking for the perfect magnification in a small mirror, 10x is perfect. I initially bought a 15x and had to be within 3-4 inches of the mirror to see clearly. There literally as no space for my hand to get between my face and the mirror to do my makeup lol. 10x is perfect. It fits nice and tight to my wall mirror. Honestly the only thing that would make it more perfect would be if the suction base also had a collar with holes for screws so it could also mount to a surface where the suction cup won't work (dry wall, a wood countertop, etc). I initially installed lithium batteries but the light didn't work, so I used alkaline. It's bright. I tried uploading pictures but it's not working. I'll try later and update my review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I can see! lol
reviews.reviewText: Both my husband and myself need reading glasses to see up close anymore, and I had other mirrors around the house that were magnified but saw this and put it up on our main bathroom mirror and even my husband uses it! It hasn’t fallen down once as some have said. But I followed the instructions. It does say after a certain period to take it off and reseal the suction. Lights are a little dim. But may need new batteries. But for what we need it’s perfect. If I need something better for up close lightning I just use my desk magnifier ring make up light.
This is probably the best purchase I've ever made on Amazon. I'm tall so I can place it anywhere I like on my mirror. I love love love the magnification.

reviews.reviewTitle: This mirror is so good, everyone is using it
reviews.reviewText: Love it, it get out all those pesky hairs between waxing
My daughter loves it. It's been stuck to the bathroom mirror for a month now and hasn't moved.
I like that ot is not huge. Perfect for my needs. Sticks great to my current bathroom mirror. I like that I could pull it down when I need it a push it out of the way when I don't.
